title: Opini√≥n tras varios meses
body:
Despu√©s de un uso intensivo (hacemos una cafetera al d√≠a), sigue dando excelentes resultados. La base sigue estando bien, sin marcas rese√±ables y sin abombamientos. Y el caf√© que hace es delicioso (claro, eso es m√°s m√©rito del propio caf√© que de la cafetera... pero algo influir√°, ¬øverdad?)
La utilizamos en una vitro de inducci√≥n sin problemas. Consejo:
Aseg√∫rate de que la base no tiene granos de caf√©, o migas, o cualquier suciedad pegada. Calienta la cafetera a potencia 7 (de un m√°ximo de 9) con la tapa levantada; cuando el caf√© empiece a subir, tapa la cafetera. Apaga el fuego en cuanto escuches que ha salido todo ,y no dejes la cafetera sobre el calor; ap√°rtala a otro "fuego" que est√© fr√≠o.

title: Toy for the people who likes special ceremonies during the preparation

In reality either you must be very skilled (to not overheat) or you need a bit more time and enthusiasm to experiment with this Coffee Maker to get something really good.
Apart of this, if you want to prepare cappuccino looking coffee, you might have way to to make milk foam. At the end taste is very "traditional". As I said at the beginning you should have a lot of time (to not overheat pot) in order to not have fines of coffee in your cup.

At the end, nothing so sophisticated but good enough to enjoy in coffee and preparation ceremony when you have really enough time to do it.

title: Makes a good coffee quickly
body:
The coffee maker is easy to use and easy to clean. Using it on the induction hob it makes good coffee quite quickly. I have found that it is best not to put the hob on full power but to use setting 6 so the peculation happens slowly.
The first one we bought leaked steam and a new one was sent out to us. The original was easily sent back in the packaging provided. All in all good product and good service.
author: Baz
